11111323.content:
Naruto walked in on what was perhaps the most uncharacteristically cheerful he had ever seen Tsunade; giggling and mumbling about. Approaching her cautiously, he thought she might have been drunk again. But normally when she drinks on the job, she's either passed out cold at her desk or knee-deep in empty bottles. Or both. This time, she didn't even smell like booze. She just seemed...happy?

"You doing good?" asked Naruto.

"Hee hee, oh yes," Tsunade replied happily, "I'm just so happy right now!"

"Really?" asked Naruto, "Why is that?"

"I've just thought a lot about feet!" Tsunade giggled, "Tickling them, touching them! It makes me so giddy!"

Naruto just noticed that on the subject of feet, hers were stretched out across her desk as she giggled away. What was going on?

11111332.content:
Naruto found his way to the Hyuga manor, and still had plenty of time left in the morning, too. The same could not be said for the Hyuga clan since no one seemed to be up or about.

"Gah!" Naruto whined, "It's a day off! People shouldn't be sleeping their day away!"

Naruto made his way to the window that led to Hinata's room, deciding to wake her up to get her to come out and have some fun.

111113322.content:
Wasting no time, Naruto jumped all the way up to Hinata's window and, using quick hand motions, unlocked it. He propped the window open and crept into her bedroom. Turning around, he saw, even in the dimly lit room, Hinata sound asleep in her bed still.

"Still asleep?" Naruto asked out loud, "Come on, it's our day off!"

Naruto went over to Hinata's bed, approaching the bluenette, assured by her soft snoring that she was still asleep. He was just about ready to scream in her ear to wake her up, until two realizations hit him.

One was that on her nightstand was a small but open bottle emitting a pleasant and mesmerizing scent around the room. It might have been some kind of ointment for Hinata, but whatever was in it, the smell alone was making Naruto feel less agitated and more giddy, not simply wanting to scream at her or shock her awake, but rather to gently wake her with a more creative touch...

The other thing was that she had pretty feet. Since her bed had long and heavy blankets, only her head and feet were exposed. But from where Naruto was standing, he could see Hinata's unpainted toes slightly twitching despite her state of deep slumber.

Naruto decided to...
111113322.title: Just go in and wake her up

choices: Put his toes in her mouth
1111133221.content:
"Come on, Hinata, wake up!" Naruto said, trying to shake her awake.

Hinata didn't seem to rise from her slumber. Naruto's next idea would surely wake her...right?

"Let's see how long you can stand this, hee hee," Naruto said.

Naruto quickly removed his sandals and walked over towards Hinata's bedstand, sitting on it while planting his bare soles on Hinata's face. He had been quite active that morning, so Naruto's feet were pretty stinky, but were otherwise soft and smooth. Too bad it didn't seem to be working. If anything, Hinata seemed to be absorbing his foot fumes like a drug.

"zzzzz.......mmmmmm...." Hinata moaned in her sleep.

"Wait...." Naruto said, "Does she...is she being relaxed like this?"

Naruto continued to smear his soles across her slumbering face, hearing more and more of the same moans. In fact, Hinata began to smile a little in her sleep.

"mmmm....zzzz...." Hinata moaned again.

This time, when Hanabi threw the door open, she saw Naruto smearing his bare feet on Hinata's face. Wide-eyed, she stared at the scene before Naruto turned his head and realized that Hinata's younger sister had busted him!

"I, uh- I can explain!" Naruto exclaimed.

"Hee hee, maybe I could have a little fun instead!" Naruto exclaimed.

For whatever reason (possibly the scented bottle), Naruto felt giddy and playful, and Hinata's long but plump toes seemed like a good way to entertain himself. He inched his face closer to her soles, inhaling the fragrance of her soles. They smelled like vanilla extract, which was probably what it was since Hinata had gone to sleep right after bathing the night before. Naruto grinned widely as he grabbed her big toe, wagging it as he moved his way down.

"This little piggy went to market...this little piggy stayed home...this little piggy has roast beef...this little piggy had none..."

Naruto started cackling to himself as he got ready for what he did next. He grabbed both her pinky toes and started wailing them around.

"This little piggy went WEE WEE WEE WEE WEE WEE WEE! All the way home!"

But the shaking of her feet and the volume of Naruto's squeals did not wake the girl. She merely continued to snore as Naruto played with her toes.

"Guess she's really down for the count, huh?" Naruto asked aloud.

11433312.content:
Young Link had been riding through the Lost Woods on his faithful horse Epona, in search of his close friend Navi. Young Link, however, had gotten horribly lost, as was to be expected from the Lost Woods, and had no idea where he was going. After a few lonely and exhausting hours of travel, however, he came across a few lone stumps in the woods. Young Link dismounted from Epona and approached them to see that a few small bottles were on them.

Unaware that he was being watched from a nearby corner, Young Link bravely opened....
11433312.title: Young Link

choices: He is found by a Female Character
He is found by a Male Character
114333122.content:
Link decides to open the Blue Bottle and as soon as he does a large plume of blue gas covers his entire face.

“Nnnngh...ugh....” Link collapsed onto his knees, the effects of the gas already beginning to take effect. The young adventurer tried to get back on his feet but he just completely slumped onto the ground as his eyes rolled into their sockets and he fell unconscious. What would happen next?
114333122.title: the blue bottle (knockout gas)

1143331221.content: Which Female Character finds him?
1143331221.title: He is found by a Female Character

114333122121.content:
Malon had casually been riding one of her horses just outside the Lon Lon Ranch thought the day. Her father had found an extra hand at the farm so she had the whole day to herself. After going a little too fast, though, Epona started spring down and neighing by a large tree.

"Whoa, girl!" Malon explained, patting the horse to relax it.

Out of the corner of her eye, Malon noticed a pair of dirty brown boots from behind the tree. Curious, she got off her horse to go investigate. And once she saw Young Link passed out cold on the floor, she began to blush.

Oh my gosh, it's him! she thought.

Malon had been crushing on Young Link for some time. And now here he was fast asleep. She normally would check on him to make sure he was okay, but for some reason, she was drawn towards his boots.

"Those have...got to be uncomfortable on him..."

Malon knelt down and immediately began pulling his boots off of his feet. She had slowly pulled them off, but just a little too close to her face as she could smell the wet leather inside.

"Pee-yew!" Malon exclaimed tossing the smelly boots aside.

And then Malon looked down to see Young Link's bare feet...they looked very smooth and sweaty, his short, slender toes resting in the grass, luring Malon closer...
114333122121.title: Malon

choices: Someone catches Malon smelling Link’s Feet!
1143331221212.content:
Despite her earlier exclamation of “Pee-yew!”, Malon know felt herself drawn to the smell of Link’s feet. Malon bent down and got her face close to Link’s feet as sweat ran down his sole, already being able to smell how stinky they were.

“Mmm...they have the strong scent of grass stuck to them. I guess that isn’t too much of a surprise considering how much running around he does.” Despite how stinky Link’s feet were, Malon found herself entranced by the aphrodisiac smell.

I can’t believe his feet really smell this good. This is amazing... Malon’s blush started to become even more intense as she unconsciously kicked off her boots, her pudgy soles sliding across the grass as she continued smelling Link’s amazing feet. These feet smell so amazing...but right now I would love to do more then smell them.... Malon licked her lips as she greedily eyed Link’s feet.
1143331221212.title: Smell his feet

choices: Put her own feet on his face

Taking a leap of faith, Malon moved her face in and puckered up, planting a kiss on his sweaty sole. It was warm to the touch and equally inviting, prompting Malon to extend her tongue and lick the balls of his feet as he continued to slumber.

"Mmm Link..." Malon said, "Your feet taste so good!"

Link didn't budge an inch as Malon's tongue traversed his soles, licking up the sweat and the salty taste of his feet.
11433312212121.title: Start worshiping Link’s sweaty feet!

12111.title: laughing gas bomb

1212.content:
Hinata Hyuga was on a mission that led her to an Akatsuki stronghold. Nameless guards in the front were easy pickings, but Hinata had worked up a sweat navigating the many traps inside.

One member of Akatsuki was following her from behind, watching as she entered the room that would be her undoing.

"It's echoing in here," Hinata said to herself, "Walking in these sandals will make too much noise..."

The Akatsuki member watched Hinata slip off her sandals as she snuck across the echoing room. But then her bare foot stepped on top of a hidden floor switch that activated the room's trap...
1212.title: Hinata Hyuga

12121.content:
From small holes in the wall, pink gas swiftly covered the room. The laughing gas quickly made its way up through Hinata's nostrils, making her mind numb and her stomach fill up with a need for laughter.

"Wha...hee hee...what's going on?" Hinata asked.

The gas surrounding her body suddenly made her feel ticklish, as she bent downwards, arms clenched into her stomach. Her laughter echoed throughout the room as she curled up into a fetal position, laughing the entire time.

"Whaheeheeheeheeheehee....ahahahahahaha!" Hinata laughed.

Her legs kicked out as she laughed, with the Akatsuki agent watching her helplessly on the ground. Now was his chance...
12121.title: Laughing gas

121211.content:
"Eh, what the hell," he figured, "This might get her to talk."

He quickly walked up to her, not at all worried about having her retaliate in her current state, and sat down next to her legs, grabbing hold of her ankles right while she was kicking her legs around.

"HeeheeheeHEE!" Hinata continued to laugh.

The agent dug the tips of his fingers into her soft soles. He didn't know if her continued laughter was from the tickling or the gas, but he enjoyed hearing her laughter. And he had to admit he was curious about how her feet were to feel if he really dug into them...
121211.title: Tickle her feet

1212112.content:
Grabbing her soles, the agent dug his thumb just underneath her arches. Though she relaxed a little, Hinata did not stop giggling.

"hehehehe," Hinata said, "That feels funny...hehe..."

Well I for one feel amazing, the agent thought. Her soles were as soft as butter, as he rubbed his hands along her smooth soles. He ran his fingers in between her toes, swerving his fingers along her digits. As she continued to giggle, the agent lifted her feet (no easy task since she was still squirming from the laughing gas) and placed her soles right on his face. A little smelly, but felt just as soft on his face as they did on his fingers. He inhaled the slightly sweaty odor of her soles and in between her toes as Hinata laughed away...

His tongue slowly slithered along her soles, making her laugh even more as he absorbed the taste of her feet. He blissfully slurped up the heels of her soles as well as the arches, licking along every wrinkle that formed as her feet squirmed from laughing so hard. His tongue slid up to the balls of her feet, and if they weren't already slightly pinkish from her natural skin, they definitely were after you sucked on them. His tongue then slurped between her cute toes as she continued to laugh, feeling her toenails underneath his tongue.

122.title: One Piece

choices: The one with Giggle-Giggle Fruit (laugh gas)
1221.content: Like many pirates of the New Age, the Straw Hat Pirates' navigator, Nami, had a high price on her head. And this town was loaded to the rim with bounty hunters. She sat alone late one night on the docks, crossing her legs and waving her sandaled feet around, just mere inches above the water. At this particular time, though, two different bounty hunters had their eye on her; one with the Giggle-Giggle Fruit, who could spread laugh gas at will and turn himself into laugh gas as well (much like the infamous Caesar Clown, but less lethal), and one with the Snooze-Snooze Fruit, who could put his victims to sleep just by touching them. Both a force to be reckoned with, but only one could claim the prize that was Nami...
1221.title: Nami

1233333.content: Oh I know: let's pick among recent characters!

12333333.content:
Even more? Well no problem! It's easy to find someone you'll like.

Then what about Briance de Cheateau? the leader of universe 2 team (http://dragonball.wikia.com/wiki/Brianne...)

Or perhaps you'll prefer sanka ku from the same team http://dragonball.wikia.com/wiki/Sanka_K...
12333333.title: More choices!

123333331.content: Would you prefer for Brianne to be in her “Base Form” from the anime or for her to just be in her Ribrianne Form like in the manga?
123333331.title: Brianne de Chateau!

1233333312.content:
It was just another day for the beautiful and plump Ribrianne as she finally returned home after a long day of fighting and spouting the wonders of love and beauty. She sat her big rump onto her coach as she quickly popped out of her boots revealing her sweaty and plump teal colored barefeet.

“Wheeew, what a long day. Glad that I can finally come back home and rest up for a bit~~” Unknown to the warrior though, a gas mask wearing intruder had broken into her house prior. This intruder was a Mega-fan of the Famous Universe 2 Fighter and had always imagined having fun with her body. As the intruder watched Ribrainne’s plump toes wiggle about, he got a smoke bomb and rolled it near Ribrainne and it quickly let out...
1233333312.title: Standard Form Ribrianne! (Manga)

choices: Play with her feet in her home.
Take her to your private hideout.
12333333122.content:
The bomb let loose a copious amount of sweet smelling gas which instantly began to flood Ribrianne's living space.

"Huh? What's that!?!" Ribrianne tried to get up but ended up slumping back on her couch, her beautiful teal feet sliding across the floor. There was no escape for the warrior as she lost control of her limbs and she started to feel light-headed. A few seconds later her eyes fluttered close and she finally lost consciousness as quiet and cute snores could be heard from her. The intruder walked out of his hiding spot as he inspected the unconscious Ribrianne carefully inspecting her feet thinking about what he should do next.
12333333122.title: Knockout Gas

123333331222.content: After a few seconds you decided it would be better to bring Ribrianne back to your secret hideout. Even though Ribrianne was quite the heavyset woman you could easily carry her if needed and with your cloak of invistangibility (a mouthful I know), you could be unseen and unfelt by others as you brought her. But the real question was to how you would brind her back to your hideout.
123333331222.title: Take her to your private hideout.

1233333312221.content:
You decide to carry the fighter in your arms as you picked the woman up. You had expected her to be a bit heavyset but she was surprisingly much lighter then you anticipated. As you started moving, uou looked at the unconscious Ribrianne in your arms, a little stream of drool running out of her mouth and a hand placed on her stomach. Her feet dangled a bit above the ground as you were mesmerized by them swinging around.

Eventually you made it to your Hideout without incident, taking off your cloak as you made it to a room which was full of Ribrianne Merchandise with a large bed in the middle. You placed her onto the bed, the plump fighter landing onto it as she imprinted her body shape into it. Now you could see her beautiful teal soles with all her wrinkles and could see her pink toes, heels and arches. You licked your lips as you thought of all the fun you would have.
1233333312221.title: Bridal Carry

choices: Take Ribrianne down with a Tranq Dart!
Fight Ribrianne on a one on one battle!
12333333122211.content:
You decide that the first thing you would do with the wondrous was give those wonderful feet of hers a good smelling. You pressed your face up against Ribrianne extremely soft soles and took a big whiff of them. They interestingly had the unique taste of of freshly cooked ribs alongside the more natural scent of sweat. You took a few more sniffs as you rubbed your face in Ribrianne’s pillow like feet before you started to suck on Ribrianne's meaty toes. The taste of ribs and steak were even stronger as you continued sucking, like Rinbrianne had stepped into a meat buffet. Of course her feet was also covered in sweat due to how hard she was working. You made sure to give all of Ribrianne's ten pudgy and round toes their deserved love and attention while they twitched at your tongue’s touch.

After finishing up with Ribrianne's toes you then quickly went back to licking up and down her wondrous soles. That meaty taste was overwhelming as you continued your worship session. You started to suck on her plump and pink heels and also playfully nibble and lick the balls of her feet. You continued to worship both of Ribrianne’s feet for quite some time loving the warrior’s wrinkles and the smell as he started to coat Ribrianne’s feet in saliva. You were utterly in love. The worship session lasted for about two hours as you completely indulged yourself with Ribrianne’s beautiful teal feet.

“Ngggh...uuuunn...” A couple hours later Ribrianne finally began to regain consciousness as she rubbed her eyes and wiggle her toes. “Uuuuuuh...Where am I?” Ribrianne looked around the room as she quickly realized that she was in some kind of strange room filled with items in her image. “This must be some kind of fan’s room...Oh, I remember now! I had just gotten home and kicked off my boots when smoke filled the room and knocked me out!” Ribrianne looked at her feet as she realized that they were quite wet. “I see. Someone must’ve been in love with my little feetsies and wanted a chance at them. But to go all the way to knock me out for them...” The warrior of love and happiness jumped off the bed and stretched a bit. “Well I should probably find a way out of here. I should also probably be careful of anymore of those smoke bombs.” Ribrianne opened the only door in the room, realizing that she was actually in some kind of wet stone dungeon. She walked into the darkness, her wet feet slapping against the stone floor.

Meanwhile, you were watching Ribrianne without being noticed. You had wanted to knock her out again after having so much fun with her feet earlier. As you quietly followed her you were thinking of how you’d knock her out again...
12333333122211.title: Smell and Worship her Feet

choices: Knock her out with a Sleeper Hold!
Knock her out with a powerful energy blast!
123333331222112.content:
You finally decided that instead of knocking her out from the shadows like before that you’d fight her fair and square. She was a warrior after all so she did deserve that at least! You quickly flew out of your hiding spot landing inches in front of the surprised Ribrianne, who was currently in a large square room made entirely of stone.

“Oh! I didn’t think that you’d just show yourself like this! So I presume you’re the one that kidnapped me right?”

“That’s right. I just had to give your beautiful feet some love!” Surprisingly, Ribrianne seemed to proud of the compliment as she rubbed her feet together and gave a haughty huff.

“Of course my feetsies are beautiful, I do try my best to take care of them! But that just means you should save pictures of them like everyone else not kidnap me!”

“Hehehe. Pictures just didn’t satisfy me anymore Ribrianne. I needed the genuine article.”

“Well you got it buddy. And unfortunately for you this genuine article is going to take you down with all the love I can muster! Perhaps I’ll even give you the satisfaction of being taken down by my feetsies!”

Ribrianne quickly flew towards you ready to deliver a powerful punch which you only barely managed to dodge. “Heh, seems like you’re a lot stronger then you look!” Ribrianne quickly countered by firing a Spiral Beam of Energy which you ended up countering with your own energy blast. However, you weren’t ready for Ribrianne to counter you with a powerful Rear Impact, her large and plump rump ramming right into your body like a powerful boulder. “Heh! How does that feel buddy? Can you feel the love coming from such a powerful attack?”

You had to silently admit that there was a lot of power in that attack. Of course on this planet, love and happiness were power and those who had the most of it were the strongest. And even though Ribrianne was considered the most powerful on her planet, there was no way she could overcome the infinite love you had for those beautiful pudgy teal feet of hers! You managed to push Ribrianne away as you fired some energy blast at her which she dodged with ease.

“Seems like we’re nowhere near the same power Level! I think that it’s about time that I end this in the most beautiful and lovely way for you!” Ribrianne flew up into the air and started to descend, ready to deliver a powerful kick with her wonderful teal sole. While you were tempted to stay in place and let the kick connect you knew that would just make you lose the fight. You quickly warped out of the way as Ribrianne was quickly flustered and confused. “Wha? Where did you go?” Now behind the barefoot Ribrianne you were prepared to...
123333331222112.title: Fight Ribrianne on a one on one battle!

1233333312221122.content:
A powerful surge of energy started to form in your hand as Ribrianne quickly turned around.

“Wha, how!” A powerful and blinding energy beam shot out from your hands as it connected with Ribrianne’s large body. “Uuuuungh....Aaaaaaah!!!!!” As you strengthened the beam it started to push Ribrianne back before engulfing her and sending her hurtling into a wall, a large plum of dust being produced with her body making contact with the wall. When the dust finally cleared you could see the unconscious and twitching Ribrianne slumped up against a giant hole in the wall. While her clothes somehow managed to be completely undamaged, their were singe and scuff marks all over them and her body. Her wet soles were now completely covered in dust and her eyes were rolled up as they showed their whites. You smiled as you stared at the unconscious fighter knowing that she’d be unconscious for a very very long time. As you walk up to take her back to the room you notice a faint red light coming from underneath her dress. Starting to panic immediately, you lifted up her dress to see what seemed to be a small electronic device that was sending out a distress signal to one of Ribrianne’s allies from the Kamikaze Fireballs. You looked at the small device’s screen and realized that...
1233333312221122.title: Knock her out with a powerful energy blast!

choices: Lay out a trap to take down the fighter.
12333333122211221.content: You quickly realize that Ribrianne had signaled for backup from Kakunsa, the feral cat like fighter! You didn't know if she was close by or still on her way so you had to think of something and fast! Should you try and fight this dangerous fighter one or one or...perhaps you could set up a trap for her...
12333333122211221.title: Kakunsa was contacted!

123333333.content: What about Pan from GT?
123333333.title: Even more possibilities!

124.content: Which lady will be your choice?
124.title: Fullmetal Alchemist

1251.content: Which lady will you choose?
1251.title: Fairy Tail

12511.content:
"Finally!" Lucy explained, "I can finally go on an S-Class mission on my own! I've waited so long for this day!"

Lucy went up to the balcony where the bulletin for current S-Class missions were posted. There were three missions that seemed to be in Lucy's range.

The first was a gang of vagabonds stealing tons of nitrium oxide (Lucy knew that as laugh gas) from major pharmaceutical companies. The second was a rogue mage kidnapping young girls for unknown purposes. And the third was a strange creature sneaking into people's homes and raiding them.

"Hmm, let me see..."
12511.title: Lucy Heartfilia

choices: The cans explode and spread the laugh gas everywhere
125111.content:
One short and uneventful train ride later, Lucy arrived just outside the town where the vagabonds were rumored to have been seen last. She took time to walk throughout the town, observing the peaceful villagers going about their daily routines, and take in some sights, specifically the view of the mountain range from the edge of town.

But one minute later, Lucy saw two suspicious figures putting canisters on a cart before riding away with it. Lucy had made the mistake of wearing her heels while on the job, so after a minute of running after them, her feet got sore. She undid the straps of her heels and put them in her bag, running barefoot after the vagabonds all the way.

By the time she catches up with them, she sees them opening a secret passage inside the mountains with even more cans of what seemed to be the laughing gas. Lucy didn't know what they were planning to do with it, but she knew she had to stop it...
125111.title: Vagabonds mission

choices: followed her to the central cavern
1251111.content:
The truest sign that these vagabonds did not want to be found was that their hideout really was just a series of caverns interconnected with each other. The ground was a series of hard rock and sand and dirt. So after a while of walking, not only did her feet get dirtier and dirtier, they were also getting quite sore from the walking and the occasionally rough ground.

A lone vagabond (we'll just call him Bo for simplicity's sake) had been tailing her from not far behind and watched as she would occasionally lift her leg up to scratch her dirty feet. It was strangely arousing to Bo, but he had his mission. A few caverns down and Bo...
1251111.title: Lucy sneaks inside behind them

12511111.content:
...took a small container of laugh gas, one of the less noticeable ones the vagabonds stole, and tossed it towards the bigger canisters that Lucy had approached. As he predicted, once the smaller one exploded, the bigger ones did as well in a chain reaction, sending laugh gas around the entire cavern.

"Wha...*cough cough* who's...?" Lucy asked.

Bo pulls out a face mask from his pocket and puts it over his face, slowly and cautiously approaching Lucy just in case she can still fight back. That did not appear to be the case. Lucy started breaking out into giggles.

"Wha..heh heh...ahaha....ahahahaha!"

Her giggles became uncontrollable laughter as she fell to the floor curled up in a ball, laughing away as Bo approached her...
12511111.title: trapped her with laugh gas

125111111.content: Bo knelt down and picked up the laughing mage, hoisting her over his shoulders. His arm had been wrapped around her smooth, yet firm, thighs as her head moved around with her laughter and her bare feet kicked out. The sight of her toes captured his attention as he took her to a more secure location...
125111111.title: Carry her somewhere else

1251111111.content: The dungeon had the perfect time to keep Lucy restrained, especially since she had been a victim of the laugh gas. Holding her down, Bo locked Lucy's wrists in shackles so that only her supple legs could move around. And boy, did they ever, with every cackle and giggle Lucy made, her bare feet kept kicking out, waiting to be 'tortured'...
1251111111.title: Dungeon

choices: Tickle her until she passes out
12511111111.content:
Bo closed in on the laughing blonde and grabbed hold of her ankles, watching her bare feet try to squirm around just mere inches from his face. Lucy laughed away as Bo traced his fingers across Lucy's smooth but dirty soles.

"My, my," Bo said, "For such a beautiful young lady, you have awfully dirty feet!"

Lucy tried to retort back with how she had to take off her shoes for stealth but could only keep laughing from the gas. It didn't help her much when Bo started wiggling his fingers across her soles, watching her laugh even more and try to move around. His fingers moved all around Lucy's soles, picking up some traces of dirt stuck to her feet as he tickled her.

"Ahahahaha, stop! Stop! That tickles! You're gonna make me....ahahahahaha!"

Bo continued tickling her soles and watching her toes spread as part of any desperate attempt from Lucy to break free from the tickle torture.
12511111111.title: Tickle her feet

125111111111.content:
With Lucy subdued and still under the effects of the laugh gas, Bo wrapped his hands around the balls of her feet and started playing with her toes, grabbing each individual one and pulling them, wiggling them around as Lucy kept laughing.

"Ahaha why does that feel so weird? Aheeheehee!!"

Bo noticed while holding her toes in his hands just how perfect and beautiful they looked; succulent, perfectly round, and the toenails were painted a glittery dark blue.

"You have really pretty toes," Bo said.

And in that moment, Bo put his nose into her toes, inhaling what he soon realized was a shockingly cheesy scent, presumably from her spending half the day in heavy footwear and the other barefoot outdoors.

"Wow, but I'm honest, they're really stinky!"

"They are not! Ahahaha!" Lucy cried out.

"Afraid so, miss," Bo said, "They stink like balls of cheese past their prime. But luckily I can help with that."
125111111111.title: Play with her toes

choices: Avatar: The Last Airbender and/or Legend of Korra

1253332.title: Western Animation

12533321.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender and/or Legend of Korra

12533322.content: Which Loud sister will you go for?
12533322.title: The Loud House

12533322331.content:
The entire Loud family had split up to do the grocery shopping as efficiently as possible. Originally they were against Lynn going to the drinks aisle because she wouldn't control herself hoarding either soda or sports drinks. Or both. They reconsidered once she already dashed her way to that aisle stocking up on whatever the budget allowed for.

But then something caught her eye...a new type of product near the end. There were only a few since it seemed to be in the product testing stages, but it was enough to intrigue Lynn.

"Oooh that looks yummy," Lynn said, "Never heard of that company but they look like they have good drinks!"

Of course she never heard of them because they didn't actually produce sports drinks. They created different gases and vapors that gave different side effects to it's users. Meant for experimental and research purposes, it somehow got slipped into a different form that became a liquid that someone was trying to pass off as a sports drink. And Lynn was about to choose one that would temporarily make her...different...
12533322331.title: Lynn

125333223333.content: Okay, maybe someone outside the family?
125333223333.title: More...

choices: My Life as a Teenage Robot
1253332333.title: More...

12533323331.content: Who's the lucky girl gonna be?
12533323331.title: Hey Arnold!

1253333.content: Okay, back to the norm, then...
1253333.title: More...

125333332.content: Something a little different then?
125333332.title: More

1253333321.content: Who shall the lucky female be?
1253333321.title: Life is Strange

125333332132.content:
The innocent, beautiful religious girl of Blackwell Academy, Kate Marsh, was sitting alone by the beach at the sunset reading a book on a bench. A lot of strange things had been going on in Arcadia Bay lately, particularly after the storm destroyed most of the town. The good news is that local communities were very quick to help and Arcadia Bay was rebuilding exponentially. The bad news is that from those sources came a couple of trouble makers. One of whom had a habit of planting gas bombs around town. No, not the explosive kind that kill people. Something a bit more mundane...

...he specialized in different types of gas. He had canisters for laugh gas, knockout gas, and even a kind that temporarily gives people a foot fetish. He didn't know the science behind how they forget about it after the gas wears off. He didn't question it either, he was just glad it worked. And seeing Kate Marsh sitting alone in her skirt, her shoes dangling halfway off her socked feet, she was too easy a target to ignore.

The question now was which type of gas he intended to use on sweet Kate Marsh?
125333332132.title: Kate Marsh

1253333322.content: Any of the leading ladies?
1253333322.title: RWBY

12533333222.content:
Beacon was quite a lively and hectic place to be during the year, and it had an equally lively population. But what caught your eye was the pretty young girls you would see on campus and around town.

Of course, by 'pretty young girls', to you that also meant targets.

See, huntresses had some of the highest bounties in Beacon's criminal underworld, and Roman Torchwick was offering big money for their capture or assassinations. But you preferred a more humane approach to catching your targets. One reason was it left less of a paper trail and it allowed you to generally go about undetected. Too many bodies would raise too many questions. But the other reason was you made a hobby out of experimenting with certain gas bombs that you designed to use on your targets.

Today's mission was to capture a young, fiery blonde named Yang Xiao Long who had been recently ruffling Roman's feathers, and you were deciding on what gas bomb to use on her today...
12533333222.title: Yang Xiao Long

choices: Yang waits for her roommates to return
Yang becomes fascinated by her own feet
125333332223.content:
"Refresh my memory," Roman said through the speaker of your Scroll, "How exactly does this...fetish bomb help you capture the target?"

You were hiding in the vents just above Team RWBY's dorm room, which was currently empty at the moment. You had been there for a while waiting for Yang to return and took the moment to quietly converse with your contracted employer.

"Because, my fabulously-dressed friend," you replied, "is that even when Yang succumbs to the gas, she won't know it's happening."

That part was true. Plus this was a chance for you to possibly see Yang's feet, as well as that of her teammates.

"And I assure you this is all part of the mission's success."

That part was bullshit. You just wanted to indulge your foot fetish and see if Yang would temporarily develop one with the gas bombs you equipped. And as luck would have it, Yang had finally returned, opening the door to her dorm room and entering alone.

"She's here," you whispered to Roman through your Scroll, "Call you back."

You hung up and waited a few moments just to make absolutely sure no one was gonna walk in on Yang. It didn't seem like there would be, as Yang herself looked like she was getting ready to relax. She sat down on her bunk and began removing her clunky boots. You wish you could get a closer view right now, but at least you can briefly glimpse the yellow nail polish on her toenails. But if you really wanted to get more hands-on experience, you had to act quick. You quietly and cautiously moved the vent door to the side and grabbed a foot fetish gas bomb. You removed the pin and quickly dropped it onto the freshly-cleaned carpet floor of the dorm room.

"Whoa! What the hell!" Yang exclaimed.

Yang immediately jumped off her bunk and got into a fighting stance, but the gas was already spreading around the room. You made sure to keep your mask on so that you would not be numbed to the gas and possibly exposed. Yang had just enough of her senses to grab the now-empty husk and toss it out the window. But by then, she already exhaled enough of the foot fetish gas and had it coursing through her system.

"What is...why do I...I feel kinda funny...but...I suddenly...I feel like..."

You grinned widely as you knew how quickly Yang was becoming fascinated by feet, just as you were.
125333332223.title: Foot fetish gas bomb

choices: Neither (someone outside of Team RWBY comes in)
1253333322231.content: Do they return individually or as a team?
1253333322231.title: Yang waits for her roommates to return

12533333222311.content: Which of Yang's teammates returns to their dorm room?
12533333222311.title: Individually

info.brief_description: Primarily a foot-fetish oriented interactive story with various anime characters
info.description: The only real rule would be to keep it foot-fetish oriented. Other than that, go nuts.
